name: Sacrifices must be made (Artiknappa)
description:
A short game on the theme of sacrificing. It's interpreted as meaning: "giving up something of value in order to get something else". That something else might be in the future, or you might sacrifice something in the future for something now.

CONTROLS:

CTRL+ENTER FOR FULLSCREEN!

Play using the arrow keys and space to jump.

Main menu is navigated using the mouse, and some screens can be progressed through using spacebar or enter (sorry, dev time caused some rushing:P)
